tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE IoT_Data (
    device_id INT,
    device_name VARCHAR(255),
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    data_value FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE IoT_Device_Data (
  device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR(50),
  data_type VARCHAR(20),
  data_value JSONB,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Blockchain_Data (
  block_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID,
  block_data JSONB,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoT_Device_Data(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IoT_Device (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50),
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    blockchain_address VARCHAR(100),
    creation_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Device_Data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    data_value FLOAT,
    data_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoT_Device(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Device_Analytics (
    analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    analytics_type VARCHAR(50),
    analytics_result VARCHAR(100),
    analysis_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES IoT_Device(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IoT_devices (
    device_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    device_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    blockchain_address VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    creation_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Device_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT REFERENCES IoT_devices(device_id),
    data_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    data_value TEXT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Device_alerts (
    alert_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT REFERENCES IoT_devices(device_id),
    alert_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    alert_message TEXT NOT NULL,
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Device_analytics (
    analytics_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT REFERENCES IoT_devices(device_id),
    analytics_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    analytics_data JSONB NOT NULL,
    analytics_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE device_status (
 status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 device_id INT,
 status VARCHAR(20),
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES device_data(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_data (
 block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 device_id INT,
 data_hash VARCHAR(100),
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES device_data(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE analytics_data (
 analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 device_id INT,
 data_type VARCHAR(50),
 analytics_result VARCHAR(255),
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES device_data(device_id)
);

CREATE TABLE real_time_data (
 real_time_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 device_id INT,
 data_value FLOAT,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 FOREIGN KEY (device_id) REFERENCES device_data(device_id)
);
